Softshoe

Syncopated ditty for the old dancers. Written for "Me and My Shadow".

Variables

ChordVoice Voice used in Chord tracks (defaults to Piano2).

  • SoftShoePlus
  • SoftShoeSus

  • SoftShoeIntro
  • SoftShoeEnd

Softshoe

Nice little dance beat with ``shuffles'' on bar 3 and 4. (4)
